name: I Hate Boring Quests
description:
You are just another adventurer who is sick of these boring quests. Complete the quests then talk to them again for a challenge.

Controls:

WASD- Movement

E- Talk

Left Click - Punch

Right Click - Shoot

P - Pause

Credits:

Sound all on sound bible and some prerecorded.

Models are from World of Final fantasy and RPG Poly pack lite.

UI elements from RPG inventory icon.
